response.overview: An average man, by the name 'Benji Amber' is roped into a murder plot when briefcase of $50,000 arrives with a note from his boss, saying its for his good work, but it quickly becomes clear that he stole the briefcase, owned by criminals, and now has framed Benji for it
response.tagline: He thought it was a bonus. It was a setup.
response.title: A $50,000 Briefcase
